headline.main: A Haitian Doctor Who Overcame the Odds in America

docs.lead_paragraph: DR. VALIERE ALCENA left the television studio where he had just finished taping a program about cardiology with Dr. Judith C. Monteferrante, the president-elect of the Westchester chapter of the American Heart Association, and arrived in a driving rainstorm at his medical office on Davis Avenue here. He turned on the waiting-room lights, illuminating a vivid art collection of landscapes and market scenes from his native Haiti and settled in for an undisturbed hour of reflection about his full and unusual life.
